pages.text: 19|77|Tumi se'ijana byaktika dekhichane, yiye amara ayatasamuha asbikara karae arau kaya, ‘arasye moka dhana-sampada arau santana-santati diya ha’ba’.
19|78|Si gayeba samparke arahita haiche neki, ne rahamanara paraa kono pratisrauti labha karaiche
19|79|ketiya'o nahaya, si yi kaya ami seya likhi raakhima arau tara sasti brd'dhihe karai thakima.
19|80|Arau si yi (dhana-sampada, janabalara katha) kaya, (tara mrtyura pichata) seya thakiba amara adhikarata arau si akalasaraiya hai amara ocarata upasthita habahi.
19|81|Arau sihamte allahara bahirae bahuto ilaha grahana karaiche, yate se'ibora sihamtara sahayaka haya
19|82|ketiya'o nahaya, anatipalame sihamte (upasyaborae) sihamtara ibadata asbikara karaiba arau sihamtara biraodhi hai yaba.
19|83|Tumi laksya karaa na'ine, ami kaphirasakalara babe cayatanaboraka erai thaicho, sihamtaka beya kamata bisesabharae pralubdha karaara babe
19|84|eteke sihamtara bisaye tumi kharakheda nakaraiba. Arasye ami sihamtara nirdharaita kala ganana karai acho
19|85|yidina rahamanara ocarata muttakbisakalaka sanmanita atithiraupe ami samabeta karaima
19|86|arau aparaadhibilakaka trsnatura arasthata jahannamara phale khedi niya ha’ba.
19|87|Yisakale rahamanara paraa pratisrauti laiche, te'omlokara bahirae kone'o chuparaicha karaiba noraaraiba.
19|89|Arasye tomaloke eta bibhatsa bisayara aratarana karaicha
19|90|yara phalata akasasamuha bidirna hai yoraara upakrama haya, arau prthirai khanda-bikhanda ha’ba arau pahara-parbata curna-bicurna hai yaba
19|91|e'i karane ye, sihamte rahamanara prati santana araopa karaiche.
19|92|Athaca santana grahana karaa rahamanara babe sobhaniya nahaya.
19|93|Akasasamuha arau prthiraita enekuraa kono na'i yiye rahamanara ocarata bandaraupe upasthita naha’ba.
19|94|Te'om sihamtara sankhya jane arau te'om sihamtaka bisesabharae ganana karai thaiche
19|95|arau kiyamatara dina sihamta sakalorae te'omra ocarata akalasaraiya hai ahiba.
